name: Boxlings
description:
Boxlings are two box-like creatures who jump around various levels helping each other to reach the portals.

How to play

You need to get each Boxling into a yellow portal to finish the level. Sometimes the Boxlings need to help each other and use themselves as a platform to jump higher or further. Boxlings leave the trail of their color on the ground, and they cannot step in it again.

Controls
  • Use the left and right arrows to move
  • Use up arrow to jump
  • Use space to swap Boxling
Cheats

If you feel like you cannot finish a level and want to skip it, you can type the following characters: IMALOOSER.

Credits
  • Jakub Mirovský
  • Jan Slifka
Acknowledgements

The game Boxlings was created during Global Game Jam 2022, and its source code is publicly available on GitHub.
